lead_paragraph: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention added eight destinations to a list of countries that pregnant women should avoid to prevent infection.
snippet: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention added eight destinations to a list of countries that pregnant women should avoid to prevent infection.

headline.main: C.D.C. Issues Travel Alert for 8 More Locations Over Zika Virus
headline.print_headline: U.S. Expands Travel Alert Over Zika Virus

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention officials add Barbados, Bolivia, Ecuador, Guadeloupe, St Martin, Guyana, Samoa and Cape Verde to list of places pregnant women should avoid due to Zika virus, which is known to cause brain damage in newborns.
